entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h except gusting to 60 in low lying areas. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:45 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:45 PM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
